issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
KitchenSink: YQL: Error querying YQL.

This is not regression. Issue occurs since 3.0.0.GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Tap On YQL local search

Expected results:
Should see a list of SushiClub near Appcelerator Mountain View ..

Actual:
Error Querying YQL occurred.

Device : iPhone 4S , iOS version : 5.1.1

CLI version : 3.1.0

XCode : 4.5.1

comments.body:
Could not reproduce this issue in below environment. Shows list of SushiClub near Appcelerator Mountain View.

Titanium SDK: 3.1.2.v20130730133101

Device - iPhone4S (iOS v5.1.1)
Moving into 3.2.1 due to lack of remaining bandwidth for 3.2.0

Closing ticket as I am unable to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
iPhone 7 (10.2)
MacOS 10.11.6 (15G31)
Studio 4.8.1.201612050850
